title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
Introducing the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - the perfect solution to keep your home and surroundings free from pesky flies! This easy-to-use and effective trap comes in a pack of 3, with each pack providing a generous 30 feet of coverage. 

No need to worry about baiting the trap, as it comes pre-baited and ready to use right out of the box. The Giant Fly Glue Trap is designed for both indoor and outdoor use, making it versatile for any situation. 

The trap features a sticky adhesive that is scented to attract flies, ensuring maximum effectiveness. Its green color blends seamlessly with your surroundings, making it discreet and unobtrusive. Made from non-toxic barn paper sheets, the trap is disposable and safe for use around children and pets.

With a lifespan of up to one full year, this trap provides long-lasting protection against flies. Its impressive coverage area spans 3600 square inches, ensuring that no fly goes unnoticed. 

The Giant Fly Glue Trap is suitable for use in various locations, including residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms. It can be used in normal conditions, as well as in damp or humid areas. 

Please note that the trap should not be placed in areas where rodenticides or snap traps are present. Instead, opt for the intelligent pest management approach provided by the Giant Fly Glue Trap.

Don't let flies ruin your day - get the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster today and enjoy a fly-free environment with ease!

With a coverage area of 3600 square inches, this Giant Fly Glue Trap is perfect for residential, commercial, industrial, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms. It can be used in normal conditions, damp areas, and humid areas, making it suitable for any environment.

With its intelligent pest management approach, the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster is a reliable and effective solution to keep your home fly-free. It's time to bid farewell to those annoying flies and enjoy a comfortable living space!
